    Test a graph

    Functions for running Bonferroni, parametric, and Simes tests

    bonferroni_sequential() test_graph()
    Test a graph
    print(<graph_report>)
    S3 print method for class graph_report
    corr_has_missing()
    Check if a correlation matrix has any missing values in a given subset
    bonferroni_test_vals() parametric_test_vals() simes_test_vals()
    Test hypotheses with the p <= (c * ) w * a method
    p_adjust_bonferroni() p_adjust_parametric() p_adjust_simes()
